QuestData.Title: A Grizzly End
QuestData.Description: This lodge serves as the largest supplier of furs and leather to Boralus.$b$b<Kennings puffs out his chest a bit.>$b$bAnd as its proprietor, it is my duty to ensure every request is met on time. With recent delays, I've decided to take a trip out here to see if the Holtons need my assistance.$b$bWe could use any available hands! Take this knife and bring back some pelts from the bears in the nearby pass.
QuestData.RewardText: These furs appear to be in fine shape. Your skills should easily make up for any setbacks caused by 'accidents'.
